channel.title: Server Crashing Due To Max Players
channel.description: I Have Max Players and Max Connection Set To 15 But Whenever It hits the max all the npc's die and the server crashes...is there a way around this with keeping the server limit?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2007, 09:05:55 PM[/size][hr]help anyone?
